meanings.definition: Promoting or advertising a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The promoing event was successful in attracting many customers.
meanings.sent2: The company used promoing strategies to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: The promoing balloons made the store look festive.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a promoing banner, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the promoing sign caught the eye of passersby.

meanings.definition: The act of offering discounts or special deals to attract customers.
meanings.sent1: During the promoing, customers rushed to get the limited-time offer.
meanings.sent2: The store's promoing led to a significant increase in foot traffic.
meanings.sent3: The promoing announcement caused a buzz among shoppers.
meanings.sent4: The promoing campaign was like a magnet, pulling in bargain hunters.
meanings.sent5: The promoing flyer was so enticing that people couldn't resist checking it out.

meanings.definition: The process of creating promotional materials for marketing purposes.
meanings.sent1: She was in charge of the promoing for the new product launch.
meanings.sent2: The team worked tirelessly on the promoing for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The promoing design meeting was filled with creative ideas.
meanings.sent4: The promoing brainstorming session sparked innovative concepts.
meanings.sent5: The promoing materials were ready just in time for the big campaign.
